title: Enroll in Courses Now!
description: Course enrollment for the upcoming semester is now open. Make sure to enroll early to secure your spot.

title: Freshmen Orientation Event
description: Welcome to the university! Join the orientation days to get familiar with the campus and meet your fellow students.

title: Lecture-Free Days
description: There will be no lectures on May 10th and 11th, 2024. Use this time to prepare for exams or relax.

title: Online Exam Registration
description: Register online for your exams. The registration deadlines are strict, and late registration is not possible.

important_dates.event: Exam Registration for the 1st and 2nd Exam Periods
Exam Registration for the 2nd Exam Period (and Retake Exams)

title: Credit Transfer for Foreign Studies
description: Get your study credits from abroad recognized. Submit your applications by April 15, 2024.

important_dates.event: Registration for Guest and Part-Time Students
